description:
Akai is a FBI agent who`s working with Jodie Starling and James Black. His identity in Black Organization is Moboroshi Dai.
[spoiler="Spoiler"]His girlfriend is Miyano Akemi, Shiho`s older sister. He had a personal vendetta with Black Organization because her death. After his fake dead by Kir. Akai change is disguise to Okiya Subaru and live in Shin`ichi house.[/spoiler]
name: Akai Shuuichi
